attributes.action: Help try and remove VAR from football
attributes.additional_details: Because fans never get a voice even if they say we do
attributes.background: Talk about how it is tuning the beautiful game

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions about how to referee football matches is a matter for organisers and the football authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.
